channel.title: CVE Feed for The Dovecot Project -- dovecot
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Dovecot Project -- dovecot

item.title: CVE-2017-15130|2024-09-16T20:17:43.957Z -- the%20dovecot%20project -- dovecot
item.description: A denial of service flaw was found in dovecot before 2.2.34. An attacker able to generate random SNI server names could exploit TLS SNI configuration lookups, leading to excessive memory usage and the process to restart.
